title: Ma Femme Est Formidable = My Wife Is Wonderful
brief_description:
Condemned without evidence as a ‘rake’ by his dimwitted wife Sylvia and his monstrous in-laws, Raymond Corbier is further bedeviled by the unwarranted advances of man-chasing Marguerite Rival.

Credits: Producer, Paul Cadeac ; director, Andre Hunebelle ; writer, Jean Halain ; photography, Paul Cotteret ; music, Jean Marion ; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Sophie Desmarets, Fernand Gravey, Simone Valere, Alfred Adam, Jacques Dynam, Max Dalban, Pauline Carton, Suzanne Dehelly.
